Add .dods to download data via the OPeNDAP protocol.</description>           <function>OPeNDAP</function>         </CI_OnlineResource>         <CI_OnlineResource>           <linkage>http://coastwatch.pfeg.noaa.gov/infog/AG_tanm_las.html</linkage>           <name>Background information: SST Anomaly, POES AVHRR, Casey and Cornillon Climatology, Global (5 Day Composite)</name>           <description>Background information for the dataset.</description>           <function>background information</function>         </CI_OnlineResource>         <CI_OnlineResource>           <linkage>http://coastwatch.pfeg.noaa.gov/erddap/wms/erdAGtanm5day/request</linkage>           <name>WMS service: SST Anomaly, POES AVHRR, Casey and Cornillon Climatology, Global (5 Day Composite)</name>           <description>The base URL for the WMS service for this dataset.</description>           <function>WMS</function>         </CI_OnlineResource>         <lworkcit>           <citeinfo>             <origin>CoastWatch (http://coastwatch.noaa.gov/)</origin>           </citeinfo>         </lworkcit>       </citeinfo>     </citation>     <descript>       <abstract>NOAA CoastWatch distributes SST anomaly data using a combination of the POES AVHRR Global Area Coverage data, and data from a climatological database by Casey and Cornillon.  AVHRR SST is compared with the climatological SST for the region and time period specified.</abstract>       <purpose>Unknown</purpose>
